import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import { Form, Row, Col, Card, Button, FormGroup, FormLabel, FormControl, } from "react-bootstrap"; const FlightBookingForm = () => { const { state } = useLocation(); const flight = state?.flight; const [form, setForm] = useState({ firstName: "", lastName: "", age: "", gender: "", email: "", phone: "", paymentMethod: "UPI", }); const handleChange = (e) => { setForm({ ...form, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; if (!flight) return

No flight selected.

; const baseFare = flight.price; const taxes = { cute: 75, rcs: 50, security: 236, udf: 207, tax: 360, convenience: 200, }; const totalFare = baseFare + taxes.cute + taxes.rcs + taxes.security + taxes.udf + taxes.tax + taxes.convenience; return (

✈️ Book Your Flight

{/* Passenger Information */}
Passenger Information
First Name Last Name Age Gender Email Phone Payment Method
{/* Fare Summary */}
Fare Summary

{flight.airline} - {flight.flightNumber}

Base Fare: ₹{baseFare}

  • CUTE Fees: ₹{taxes.cute}
  • RCS & Admin Charge: ₹{taxes.rcs}
  • Aviation Security Fee: ₹{taxes.security}
  • User Development Fee: ₹{taxes.udf}
  • Tax: ₹{taxes.tax}
  • Convenience Fee: ₹{taxes.convenience}
You Pay: ₹{totalFare}
); }; export default FlightBookingForm;
